subject: AI & Agents
title: Evaluation Metrics: Precision, Recall, NDCG
description: Learn Evaluation Metrics: Precision, Recall, NDCG in one minute.

hook.text: Your model recommends 10 items. 3 are relevant. Is that good? Depends on the metric.

buildup.text: Precision@K: fraction of recommended items that are relevant. Recall@K: fraction of relevant items found.

discovery.text: NDCG (Normalized Discounted Cumulative Gain) rewards putting relevant items higher in the list.

twist.text: High precision but low recall means you're safe but missing opportunities. Both matter.

climax.text: Choose metrics that match your business goal: discovery (recall) vs trust (precision).

punchline.text: The right metric depends on what matters most to your users.

quiz.question: What does NDCG reward in recommendation ranking?
options: Placing relevant items higher in the list
